titleStmt.title: A Vindication of a short treatise of tythes lately written, and excepted against by a pamphlet, stilled, the funeral of tythes, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Newcomb, for Thomas Heath, and are to be sold at his shop in Russel-street, near the Piazza's of Covens-Garden.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: The funeral of tythes, A tract of tythes, and A treatise of tythes. (p.3).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Russel-street, near the Piazza's of Covens-Garden.
